p: Different spices and herbals (23 in nos.) were used to prepare ‘BhAVI-23’ mix. Many of these were picked from the centre’s botanical garden and whole spices were procured from authentic spice whole-seller in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India registered with Food Safety & Standards Authority of India (FSSAI). Thoroughly washed and solar dried ingredients were powdered and strained. All the 23 ingredients were added in a proportion (total wt. 57.85 g) as detailed in Table S1. For preparation of infusion, approximately 1 small tablespoon (∼1 g) of the powder was suspended in ∼200 ml of water. This suspension was further boiled for 5 min and strained to obtain ready-to-be consumed hot beverage.
